description: The soaring cost of living has seen consumers "put the brakes" on their shopping habits, new figures show.
title: Shoppers 'put brakes' on spending as cost of living crisis bites

description: Sales of used pure electric cars have reached a record high, according to new figures.
title: Sales of used electric cars reach record high

description: British Gas owner Centrica says it expects to achieve full-year adjusted earnings per share at the top of the range forecast by analysts.
title: British Gas owner Centrica is optimistic after solid four months

description: Monique Fayad, chief executive of Trellus Health, speaks to Ian King about their work as a technology platform working to improve digital health.
title: Digital health, payments infrastructure and a new tech unicorn

description: Cryptocurrencies and US tech stocks were taking a hammering on Monday night amid a continuing flight from risk as a toxic cocktail of worries for the global economy grip investors.
title: Bitcoin and US tech stocks hammered as global flight from risk intensifies

description: Convenience retailer McColl's has been formally bought out of administration by its existing trading partner Morrisons in a deal that saves all its 16,000 jobs and its stores.
title: McColl's rescued from administration by Morrisons, saving all 16,000 jobs

description: P&O Ferries has been told the Pride of Kent can resume sailings between Dover and Calais after passing a safety inspection at the fourth attempt.
title: P&O Ferries' Pride of Kent cleared to sail again at fourth attempt

description: A member of the Bank of England's rate-setting committee has warned he sees  inflation exceeding its latest forecasts without more aggressive action.
title: Bank of England rate-setter sees inflation higher than forecast of 10.25% ahead

description: The UK's first lithium factory, which aims to supply European electric car and battery makers, has secured new investment.
title: Boost to future of electric cars as UK's first lithium plant secures new investment

description: Millions of people are set to be moved off legacy benefits and on to Universal Credit starting on Monday – a plan charities have deemed "too dangerous to continue".
title: Government urged to stop 'dangerous' Universal Credit rollout this week
